name: AAAAAAHHH MY ARRRRRRRRRRMMMM
description: Here's a joke weapon I put together in an hour or two. Idk if anyone would even touch it, but here you go. Long story short, DoomGuy wakes up one day with some Rayman-esque powers, but slightly (just a bit) more painful for him and his enemies. Preview Spritesheet: http://i.imgur.com/ADsHk.png Preview Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ZMcafGtZsA
